snippet.title: Word Brawl | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Hey everyone! This project was my first attempt at creating a mobile game in Unity with Ads and In-App Purchases.

Although the final outcome didn't meet my expectations, I believe it's a solid starting point! I'm particularly proud of the AI Bots I developed—they can plan, strategize, and operate independently. They feel pretty "alive"! (However, there are a few bugs where they occasionally freeze in place.)

I don't plan to continue developing this game or publish it on Google Play or the App Store. Maybe I'll release one final update to add some finishing touches, but I hope you enjoy playing this game! :)

DOWNLOAD AND PLAY THE GAME HERE:
https://williamjacobproductions.com/wordbrawl

Stay tuned for future projects!

________________________________________________________

Check out my Games:
https://williamjacobproductions.com/

https://twitter.com/WilliamJacobP
